author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FERNAND NOT DONE QUITE YET... ...FORECAST TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL BY LATE WEDNESDAY...
summary: ...FERNAND NOT DONE QUITE YET... ...FORECAST TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL BY LATE WEDNESDAY... As of 5:00 PM AST Tue Aug 26 the center of Fernand was located near 38.1, -53.4 with movement NE at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FERNAND NOT DONE QUITE YET... ...FORECAST TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL BY LATE WEDNESDAY... As of 5:00 PM AST Tue Aug 26 the center of Fernand was located near 38.1, -53.4 with movement NE at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Fernand (AT1/AL062025)
